packageRules.description: This library powers native Node.js fetch, and we want to use the exact same version as Node.js to avoid potential issues. Instead of relying on Renovate to update this dependency, we bump it when we bump the Node.js version (enforced by a unit test).
versions >=3 mark WebGL1 as incompatible, but maplibre-gl-js supports WebGL1 and WebGL2
